content: From time to time we will provide links to other web sites, not owned or controlled by Blue Cross NC or Amerigroup. We do this because we think this information might be of interest or use to you or where, as a member, we can provide you with value added services. While we do our best to ensure your privacy, we cannot be responsible for the privacy practices of other sites. A link to a non-Healthy Blue web site does not constitute or imply endorsement by Blue Cross NC or Amerigroup. Additionally, we cannot guarantee the quality or accuracy of information presented on non-Healthy Blue web sites. We encourage you to review the privacy practices of any web site you visit.
